prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that looks like a child with a whimsical outfit.
Design a Pokemon that can mimic human actions and expressions.
Show me a small, mischievous creature that loves to perform tricks.
Imagine a cute character that combines elements of a clown and a mime.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and enjoys entertaining.
Make a character that has distinct pink and blue colors with a unique hairstyle.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that can easily blend into forest settings.
